channel.title: Don't pay the Ferryman - September
channel.description:
2 September sessions - Fantasy Espionage and Exploration (pbta)
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LkC_J_6fLCKlU7ozS5q
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LkC_g5qMOUaLFSwwA-v
• You travel between magical places as explorers, investigators and agents. • You decide how your mystical powers manifest (gadgets, spells, war cries, other) • You work for an Arcane Order, a church, a Ninja Ryu, or a Ferryman. • You start with a Familiar, a Sanctuary, or the ability to create Portals.
Playbooks - https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1qoOM1c0t_wcfSAg_cQM6DkotCHKMSDbw
Sessions will be recorded via Youtube.
Any questions hit me up on blakeryan74@gmail.com or @blakeryanbatman
